author: Bradley A. Thayer and Lianchao Han, opinion contributors
title: What did China's Xi know, and when did he know it?
description: What did China's Xi know, and when did he know it? (Second column, 9th story, link ) Drudge Report Feed needs your support! Become a Patron
content: As the global public health crisis continues, it is useful to reflect that its cause is the actions and policies of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP). Their conduct has been reprehensible. They have suppressed whistleblowers and information, destroyed lab sam… [+7325 chars]
